snippet: HOWAT--Anne Hadley. A memorial service for Anne Hadley Howat will be held Thursday, April 21 at 11am at Madison Avenue Presbyterian Church, 921 Madison Avenue. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HOWAT--Anne Hadley. A memorial service for Anne Hadley Howat will be held Thursday, April 21 at 11am at Madison Avenue Presbyterian Church, 921 Madison Avenue. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  HOWAT, ANNE HADLEY
